flag_output_folder: Folder to which typings should be written
flag_namespace: Classes namespace to generate, for example sbqq
fetching_namespaces: fetching namespaces with at least one global class
package_without_classes: Namespace {package} does not have any classes
example_fetch_for_one_namespace:
#Fetch typings for namespace
sfdx apex-typings:namespace -o classes/.typings -n sbqq
